Package au.edu.anu.twcore.ecosystem.runtime

Interface SimulationTracker

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataTracker<T,​M>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataTracker, AggregatorDataTracker, ArenaDataTracker, DataTracker0D, DataTracker2D, DataTrackerXY, SamplerDataTracker, SpaceDataTracker
public interface SimulationTracker
An ancestor for data trackers which track a flow of timed data
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 19 f√©vr. 2021

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    closeRecord()
    Perform any operations required to stop recording (eg flush data).
    void
    closeTimeRecord()
    Perform any operations required at the end of a time step
    default void
    openRecord()
    Perform any operations required to start recording.
    void
    openTimeRecord​(SimulatorStatus status, long time)
    Perform any operations required at the beginning of a time step.

  • Method Details

    • openTimeRecord

      void openTimeRecord​(SimulatorStatus status, long time)
      Perform any operations required at the beginning of a time step.
      Parameters:
      status - the simulator status
      time - the time step (in simulator TimeLine units)

    • closeTimeRecord

      void closeTimeRecord()
      Perform any operations required at the end of a time step

    • openRecord

      default void openRecord()
      Perform any operations required to start recording. NOTE: must be called after openTimeRecord(...).

    • closeRecord

      default void closeRecord()
      Perform any operations required to stop recording (eg flush data). NOTE: must be called before closeTimeRecord(...).
